testcase.title: rhsm.gui.tests.proxy_tests.no_litter_in_location_when_using_proxy
testcase.description: Given a system is subscribed without proxy. When I click on 'Configure Proxy' and I click on 'I would like to connect via an HTTP Proxy' and I click on 'Use Authentication with HTTP Proxy' Then I should see nothing in a field 'Proxy Location'.
